item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I’m Akshay. I’m an engineer living in San Francisco, CA. Some background details: I grew up in San Jose, CA and Bangalore, India Went to Caltech Currently work on perception at Nuro focusing on using machine learning to track objects I am currently focused on building software that creates value for users using machine learning models. Some current interest areas are self-driving cars, video editing with AI, code generation, writing assistants, new interfaces for idea generation, and automating computers.
